com.tyrlib2.gui

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.gui.Window
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdateable, ITouchListener, Prioritizable

    public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUpdateable, ITouchListener
    Basic window class
    Author:
    Sascha

    • Method Detail

      • fadeOut

        public void fadeOut(float minAlpha,
           float time)
        Fade the window out until minAlpha has been reached
        Parameters:
        minAlpha - The target alpha value
        time - Time until minAlpha will be reached

      • fadeIn

        public void fadeIn(float maxAlpha,
          float time)
        Fade the window in until maxAlpha has been reached. If the window was not visible, it will be made visible.
        Parameters:
        maxAlpha - The target alpha value
        time - The time until maxAlpha will be reached

      • getBlendState

        public com.tyrlib2.gui.Window.BLEND_STATE getBlendState()
        Get the current blending state
        Returns:

      • endBlend

        public void endBlend()
        Jump to the end of current blending operations. If the end alpha was 0, then the visibility of the window will be set to false.
